Name: Libertine
Review Text:
The place is cozy and the personnel is really friendly. Food is good, but not something extra
ordinary. Presentation of dishes could be better. We had Rib eye which was good, but green verts were overcooked. Risotto of the week had too much onions.

Name: Libertine
Review Text: Libertine Petit Cafe boasts a prime position on the Noordermarkt, perfect for sunny afternoons watching the world go by. However, the perfectly-pitched terrace is where the fun ends. Step inside on a weeknight and the restaurant is …

Name: Libertine
Review Text: I had a coffee and a tart and both were tasty.

Name: Libertine
Review Text:
Not the most pleasant experience. Half of the items of the menu were not available (champagne, beers on tap, etc.). Service is horrible.
I would not come back but their french toast with berries is beyond delicious.

Name: Libertine
Review Text: Nice interior but service is lousy. Waiter forgot what we ordered and after 45 minutes we still hadn’t received our breakfast orders. The waiter didn’t get back to us after we asked how much longer we had to wait so in the end we left. Too bad because the place seems nice enough.

Name: Libertine
Review Text: I recently went to Libertine Petit Cafe after having not been for quite some time, and I was very happy with my experience! Great food, good vibes and music, and friendly fast service. I was also told they will be adding more cocktails and food to the menu soon. Definitely going back!

Name: Libertine
Review Text: Nice sunny terrace, great neighborhood, just next to the Noordenmarkt, but the service and the prices could be better. The prices are over the top. And because there are many more nice terraces in the neighborhood, next time I'll rather take my chair at other sunny terrace.

Name: Libertine
